description: This file is a React component for the root layout of a web application built with Remix framework. It sets up document structure and styling links, and renders outlet content.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Returns an array of link objects for preconnecting to fonts and linking a stylesheet.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component defining the HTML structure including head metadata and body, wrapping children content.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Default React component rendering the Outlet for nested routes.
